Title: The Drone Queen
Writer: Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Alex Gansa
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Nazanin Boniadi, Laila Robins
Plot: Carrie makes a crucial decision after learning pressing intelligence; Saul struggles to adjust to his new role in the private sector.
